features: This broom measures just under 3 feet at 34 inches
Natural Corn Blend Bristles: The Flo-Pac Lobby Broom boasts 100% natural corn blend brooms, providing an eco-friendly and sustainable cleaning solution for kitchens, restaurants, and homes
Extended Use with High Bristle Fill Count: Featuring a high bristle fill count, this short broom delivers extended use and reliable performance
Durability and Value: Enjoy exceptional durability and unbeatable value with the Flo-Pac Lobby Broom
Rattan and Corn Fiber Blend: Combining the strength of 80% rattan and the natural properties of 20% corn fiber bristles, this broom offers a perfect balance of resilience and flexibility
Versatile and Vibrant: With its 34-inch height and vibrant red color, the Flo-Pac Lobby Broom adds a touch of style to your cleaning routine
body.description: Elevate your cleaning game with the Flo-Pac Lobby Broom – a short broom designed for kitchens, restaurants, and homes, delivering a perfect blend of style, sustainability, and sweeping prowess. This lobby broom takes eco-friendly cleaning to a new level. The Flo-Pac Lobby Broom proudly features 100% natural corn blend brooms, offering a sustainable solution for conscientious users. Embrace the power of nature in your cleaning routine, making a positive impact on the environment while achieving spotless results in your kitchen, restaurant, or home. Our short broom is engineered for extended use, thanks to its high bristle fill count. Experience reliable and efficient performance as the dense bristles sweep through dirt and debris, ensuring your space stays consistently clean with every use. Exceptional durability meets unbeatable value with the Flo-Pac Lobby Broom. This broom is not just a cleaning tool; it's an investment in long-lasting performance. Enjoy the cost-effective solution that withstands the demands of regular use, providing you with reliable sweeping power without breaking the bank. Unleash the perfect balance of resilience and flexibility with our lobby broom's unique composition. Boasting an 80% rattan and 20% corn fiber blend, this broom combines the strength of rattan with the natural properties of corn fiber, ensuring optimal sweeping efficiency on various surfaces. A versatile cleaning companion that adapts to your needs. Standing at 34 inches tall and adorned in vibrant red, the Flo-Pac Lobby Broom isn't just a cleaning tool – it's a statement piece for your space. Add a touch of style to your cleaning routine while enjoying the versatile performance that tackles messes with ease.

productInformation.name: Warranty Description
productInformation.value: Carlisle warrants to the original buyer that if this product proves defective (manufacturer's defect) within one year from the date of purchase, carlisle will replace the product free of charge. This warranty only covers manufacturer's defects and does not cover abuse, misuse, normal wear and tear or modifications to the product not made by carlisle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This broom is well made and very durable. It is small and fits into tight places. I had to return it, because it didn’t work for what I needed. The company happily refunded me. Their customer service is excellent. I highly recommend this broom for anyone who needs a small broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very short, poorly constructed, strands of broom fall off constantly.
reviews.reviewText: The broom ended up even being too short for me, maybe good fo a child?? It constantly is losing strands of bristle and I frankly threw it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This break is a good fit bought as a gag gift for Christmas but does work good as an actual broom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Read the dimensions
reviews.reviewText: I had been on the hunt for a stiff corn broom for sweeping outside and I caught this on sale for $7, got excited, and me being hasty did not read the dimensions in the product description and ordered it thinking it was a full sized broom.It wasn't.But it didn't really matter because it was the perfect size for my 4-year old who had been asking for a broom of her own so she could help sweep leaves off the carport. It is a fairly sturdy little broom that is the perfect size for her. It also seems like it would be handy to try to sweep out narrow places.I had hoped the corn bristles would have been a little stiffer, but they bend a little more than I would want which is the reason for 4 stars instead of 5... but again, this turned in to the play broom for my 4 year old and she is delighted with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Broom works well but much shorter than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: only problem with this broom is it is not big enough for my mother-in-law to fly on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more stealing mamas broom
reviews.reviewText: The perfect height and weight for mamas little helper! Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A wet and soggy broom and box.
reviews.reviewText: Delivery person said they left it in my mailbox. Really??? How about 3 feet out from my overhang on a rainy Michigan day.Broom is okay-the top of the stick is very tough, will need sanding before a child uses it.
This is a handy little broom. I had to order a box to justify the unit cost and am giving them away as gifts.
